document.full_text: chinese premier wen jiabao defended six-party talks proposed by beijing as the way to defuse volatile divisions on the korean peninsula, even as china hosted north korean leader kim jong-il, blamed by japan and south korea for inflaming regional tensions.
document.title: china pushes talks on north korea as kim visits
lines_and_colors: chinese premier wen jiabao defended six-party talks proposed by beijing as the way to defuse volatile divisions on the korean peninsula, even as china hosted north korean leader kim jong-il, blamed by japan and south korea for inflaming regional tensions.
